body_html:
@meteorcloudy, after some research I was able to build the //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so project after applying a Eigen patch (already discussed in #19198 )

The generated files Is there going to be possible to generate a dll similar to cmake build for windows? The project only builds the so libs not dlls.
body_text:
@meteorcloudy, after some research I was able to build the //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so project after applying a Eigen patch (already discussed in #19198 )
The generated files Is there going to be possible to generate a dll similar to cmake build for windows? The project only builds the so libs not dlls.
body:
@meteorcloudy, after some research I was able to build the `//tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so` project after applying a Eigen patch (already discussed in #19198 ) 

The generated files Is there going to be possible to generate a dll similar to cmake build for windows? The project only builds the so libs not dlls.
